title: Instructional Design Science Mastery Based on Design Space

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational educational theory knowledge and digital literacy
context.additional_context: Developing design competencies applicable to real-world social problem-solving scenarios

learning_goals: Learners can implement complex educational problem-solving processes with 80% accuracy using the design space framework.
Learners successfully develop three or more customized instructional designs reflecting learner situatedness in simulation environments.
Learners can analyze the effectiveness of designed educational solutions using a four-level measurement framework through VR-based assessment tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
